channel.title: How do you change the client back ground
channel.description:
Hello i am scottie2020 and wanted to know if anyone can help me out on change my background on the exiluim source and client its in a .txt file but i dont know how to add my image to it.
Please if you can help add me on skype ztxslashaarx or Post a comment thank you.

item.title: How do you change the client back ground
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:532103”]There is no way your client, or images are in a text file.

Open your C:/ drive, there should be a cache folder in there (Named exiluim or similar). Open it, look for a image titled “deathmoon” or “Background”.
It can be anywhere in the cache files.[/quote]
Sprites.
or use search bar in the cache and you most likely find it when you search for .png

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the client back ground

item.title: How do you change the client back ground
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

There is no way your client, or images are in a text file.

Open your C:/ drive, there should be a cache folder in there (Named exiluim or similar). Open it, look for a image titled “deathmoon” or “Background”.
It can be anywhere in the cache files.

Read full topic
